Industrial Processes.Description: Industrial processes can be optimized to improve energy efficiency, reducing energy consumption and greenhouse gas emissions.
Industrial processes can incorporate renewable energy sources such as solar, wind, or hydro power to reduce reliance on fossil fuels and decrease carbon footprint.
Industrial processes generate waste that needs to be properly managed to minimize environmental impact and promote sustainability.
Industrial processes can implement carbon capture technologies to capture and store carbon dioxide emissions, mitigating climate change.
